last_episode_to_air.name: The Assault
last_episode_to_air.overview: The team uncovers many of the mysteries surrounding Mutant X after the Dominion captures Lexa and Jesse.

name: Mutant X
overview:
Mutant X is a science fiction television series that debuted on October 6, 2001. The show was created by Avi Arad, and it centers around Mutant X, a team of "New Mutants" who possess extraordinary powers as a result of genetic engineering. The members of Mutant X were used as test subjects in a series of covert government experiments. The mission of Mutant X is to seek out and protect their fellow New Mutants. The series was filmed in Toronto, Ontario, Canada.

Even though the series had high ratings and was meant to be renewed for a fourth season, it was abruptly canceled in 2004 after the dismantling of Fireworks Entertainment, one of the show's production companies, ending the show on a cliffhanger.
tagline: Creation can have it's side effects

episodes.name: The Shock of the New (1)
episodes.overview: A mutant empath on the run from mysterious government agents is rescued by a team of fellow ""New Mutants"" - the group known as Mutant X.

episodes.name: I Scream the Body Electric (2)
episodes.overview: Brennan is captured and falls under Eckhart's control, and forced to work against the New Mutants.

episodes.name: Russian Roulette
episodes.overview: Mutant X comes to the aid of a teenager New Mutant pursued by Russians - she holds the secret to a new weapon that targets mutants.

episodes.name: Fool for Love
episodes.overview: Shalimar becomes close to another feral when it's ""lust at first sight,"" but matters become complicated when her new boyfriend tries to find a cure for his condition.

episodes.name: Kilohertz
episodes.overview: A mutant terrorist, Kilohertz, threatens to throw the world into chaos.

episodes.name: The Meaning of Death
episodes.overview: A mysterious plague targeting New Mutants only threatens to wipe out the underground community, and Mutant X and the GSA must join forces to eliminate it before it's too late.

episodes.name: Lit Fuse
episodes.overview: Eckhart seeks a mutant who can absorb energy, one who Brennan becomes romantically involved with.

episodes.name: In the Presence of Mine Enemies
episodes.overview: Jesse falls in love with a computer hacker, who Eckhart wants to ""procure"" to use to corrupt the public computer news channels against New Mutants and to the GSA's benefit.

episodes.name: Crime of the New Century
episodes.overview: A New Mutant is kidnapped from his family and Mutant X set out to recover him and find out what Eckhart's interest in him is.

episodes.name: Dark Star Rising
episodes.overview: Members of an international anti-terrorist unit, Dark Star, are striking against the GSA and Mutant X discovers that they are previouisly undiscovered New Mutants.

episodes.name: Whiter Shade of Pale
episodes.overview: A New Mutant with the power of invisibility is working against both Eckhart and Adam, despite the fact she was involved with Adam in the past.

episodes.name: Double Vision
episodes.overview: An old friend of Brennan's lures him and Emma into a trap - Emma ends up split into two separate entities, one good and one evil.

episodes.name: Blood Ties
episodes.overview: Jesse is roped into a deadly undercover mission by his estranged father, who is working against Eckhart.

episodes.name: Altered Ego
episodes.overview: A young New Mutant from Adams' past shows up, seeking revenge for her father's death.

episodes.name: Lazarus Syndrome
episodes.overview: Emma falls prey to a modern-day vampire who must feed on the life force of New Mutants in order to survive.

episodes.name: Interface
episodes.overview: Emma reunites with an old friend who possesses telecyber powers. The reunion turns dangerous, however, when Michelle tries to turn Emma over to the GSA.

episodes.name: Presumed Guilty
episodes.overview: Adam is framed for murder by a New Mutant with the ability to steal people's memories.

episodes.name: Ex Marks the Spot
episodes.overview: Shalimar's former boyfriend shows up and is trying to recover a Fabrege Egg that holds a microchip of extraordinary power.

episodes.name: Nothing to Fear
episodes.overview: Eckhart employs the services of a New Mutant mercenary with the power to control dreams, and sends him against Mutant X.

episodes.name: Deadly Desire
episodes.overview: Brennan falls under the sway of a New Mutant who can emit seductive pheromones while attempting to recover a computer virus.

episodes.name: A Breed Apart
episodes.overview: Mutant X encounters a new faction of New Mutants - the Strand, led by the powerful first mutant, Gabriel Ashlocke.

episodes.name: Dancing on the Razor
episodes.overview: Mutant X and Genomex are both captured on film using their powers, and they both have to deal with the reporter who plans to go public with the information.

episodes.name: Past as Prologue
episodes.overview: Ashlocke revives an ancient Egyptian alchemist in an attempt to preserve his own life.

episodes.name: Power Play
episodes.overview: A military officer lures in Mutant X in a complicated scheme to get at a vital element stored in the core of a power plant.

episodes.name: Time Squared
episodes.overview: Ashlocke gains access to a mutant who can travel through time, and he uses her to go back and alter his own history and cure himself.

episodes.name: Whose Woods These Are
episodes.overview: Mutant X investigates a series of deaths in the wilderness that may or may not involve a feral mutant.

episodes.name: The Future Revealed
episodes.overview: Gabriel gains access to Sanctuary and attempts to force Adam into providing a cure for his fatal condition.

episodes.name: No Man Left Behind
episodes.overview: A U.S. military plane is shot down and the tem must go in to recover the pilot.

episodes.name: Crossroads of the Soul
episodes.overview: Brennan is trapped in a strange town without his powers that is sealed off from the outside world, and must deal with the paranoid townspeople who desire to hide their secret.

episodes.name: Sign from Above
episodes.overview: Aliens are targeting New Mutants to capture samples to take back with them.

episodes.name: Body and Soul
episodes.overview: A body-jumping New Mutant uses his abilities to gain revenge on Genomex and the three scientists who ""cursed"" him with his powers.

episodes.name: Understudy
episodes.overview: With Shalimar in sickbay, the team recruits a new feral to temporarily take her place, but the feral plans to become a full-time member of the team...any way she can.

episodes.name: The Grift
episodes.overview: A former flame of Brennan's shows up asking for his help...and revealing that her son is Brennan's child.

episodes.name: At Destiny's End
episodes.overview: Emma must go undercover to join a group of eco-terrorists run by another empath.

episodes.name: Within These Walls
episodes.overview: A psychotic New Mutant escapes from prison and goes after Adam, seeking revenge.

episodes.name: Hard Time
episodes.overview: Jesse and Brennan go undercover to investigate a prison gladiatorial scheme.

episodes.name: Under the Cloak of War
episodes.overview: Adam is the target of an assassination league. After their first failure, he sends Shalimar to infiltrate the group but the situation quickly becomes dangerous for her.

episodes.name: Once Around
episodes.overview: The team must protect a defense witness against a New Mutant who can project his senses through others.

episodes.name: Final Judgment
episodes.overview: Adam is put on trail by a mysterious Tribunal for crimes against humanity.

episodes.name: Inferno
episodes.overview: The team tracks down a pyromaniac mutant but matters are complicated when Emma is ""possessed"" by the spirit of his most recent victim.

episodes.name: One Step Closer
episodes.overview: The team must protect a senator's daughter but Brennan's powers grow out of control, endangering the mission.

episodes.name: Reality Check
episodes.overview: A New Mutant with the ability to manipulate the minds and perceptions of others sets out to locate Sanctuary, and captures Shalimar to do so.

episodes.name: Reawakening
episodes.overview: The team travel to an oil rig to fight a protocanth, a prehistoric reanimated humanoid that endangers all humanity.

episodes.name: Lest He Become
episodes.overview: Shalimar's father is involevd in secretive genetic research. The team investigates and finds out that the person backing him has plans of their own.

episodes.name: Into the Moonless Night
episodes.overview: In the aftermath of disaster, the Mutant X team must deal with the death of one of their teammates, the disappearance of another, the return of Mason Eckhart, and the arrival of a mysterious mutant with an agenda of her own.

episodes.name: Wages of Sin
episodes.overview: The Mutant X team must stop the auction of a highly lethal substance that a number of notorious international terrorists are vying to acquire.

episodes.name: The Breed
episodes.overview: The Mutant X team is brought in to help a military base that has become infected with a deadly disease.

episodes.name: Where Evil Dwells
episodes.overview: The Mutant X team must stop a serial killer who leaves clues to his next victims in the form of puzzles.

episodes.name: The Taking of Crows
episodes.overview: When Lexa is unknowingly drugged with a lethal substance, the team must race to find the antidote before it's too late.

episodes.name: Shadows of Darkness
episodes.overview: The Mutant X team is called in to investigate bizarre activities occurring at a local hospital.

episodes.name: The Hand of God
episodes.overview: The Mutant X team embarks on a mission to locate and capture a powerful super-mutant who possesses god-like powers.

episodes.name: Wasteland
episodes.overview: Jesse is forced to reconnect with his former fianc when the Mutant X team learns that her company is involved in the genetic manipulation of crops.

episodes.name: No Exit
episodes.overview: A revenge-seeking cybernetic mutant uses his powers to overtake Sanctuary's security system in a plot to destroy Mutant X.

episodes.name: Brother's Keeper
episodes.overview: The Mutant X team learns about Lexa's estranged twin brother when he becomes the main target of an underground operation harvesting mutant organs.

episodes.name: Possibilities
episodes.overview: Brennan and the Mutant X team join forces with a time traveling mutant to diffuse a bomb threatening devastating consequences.

episodes.name: Conspiracy Theory
episodes.overview: While Brennan and Shalimar investigate a mysterious plane crash, Lexa contemplates her future with the Mutant X team.

episodes.name: Art of Attraction
episodes.overview: As the Mutant X team fights to retrieve a formula hidden in a collection of artwork, Shalimar is given vital information from a mysterious source

episodes.name: A Normal Life
episodes.overview: Mutant X tracks down a rogue scientist while Shalimar breaks away from the team to help Adam save the scientist and uncover the real bad guy.

episodes.name: Divided Loyalties
episodes.overview: Brennan is forced to return to his criminal past when Mutant X discovers that his old partner is involved in stealing secrets from the Dominion.

episodes.name: Age of Innocence
episodes.overview: Mutant X unearths an old military experiment involving an age-reversal serum and is surprised to discover that Jesse's grandfather is a one of the test subjects.

episodes.name: She's Come Undone
episodes.overview: Discovering that their teammate Lexa is the subject of a covert experiment that is controlling her, the Mutant X team hunts for the doctor responsible.

episodes.name: In Between
episodes.overview: When Jesse's life hangs in the balance, Brennan must connect to him and lead him through past memories they've shared in order to save his life.

episodes.name: Dream Lover
episodes.overview: Mutant X must stop a scientist from cloning women for use as slaves in his ultra-exclusive men's club.

episodes.name: The Prophecy
episodes.overview: Brennan battles with a Guardian of the Prophecy to stop the late mutant Ashlocke's plan from beyond the grave of world domination.

episodes.name: Cirque des Merveilles
episodes.overview: Lexa's suspicions lead Mutant X to unveil a traveling death camp, which is posed as a circus for mutant refugees and Mutant X's enemy within the Dominion.

episodes.name: The Assault
episodes.overview: The team uncovers many of the mysteries surrounding Mutant X after the Dominion captures Lexa and Jesse.
